Sandy_Springs.Seigakuin Atlanta International School: Seigakuin Atlanta International School (聖学院アトランタ国際学校, Seigakuin Atoranta Kokusai Gakkō, SAINTS) is an international private elementary school located in Peachtree Corners, Georgia, United States, northeast of Atlanta. It is an affiliate to Seigakuin University, and therefore is a Shiritsu zaigai kyōiku shisetsu (私立在外教育施設) or an overseas branch of a Japanese private school. It is the only school in Greater Atlanta to have its curriculum accredited by the Japanese Ministry of Education.
